# EP510-240093 - Towing Services Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Information

### Reference Number:
WS4136333889

### Amendment Number: 
No. 0

### Solicitation Number:
WS4136333889

### Brief Description:
The Government of Canada is issuing a request for standing offer for towing services in the Province of Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

## Tender Details

### Tender Closing Date: 
2023-09-07 at 2:00 PM EDT

### Expected Contract Start Date:
2023-09-30

### Contract End Date: 
No end date specified at present

### Categories: 

* Service Code: *78141505
* Description: Towing service for commercial and private vehicles

## Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the evaluation criterion.

## Tendering Procedure
A competitive bidding process will be used.

## Award Conditions
The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder for each stream separately, with both streams eligible to receive a standing offer.

## Location

The services will be provided to GCSurplus Downsview Sales Centre in Ontario.
